snippet: A Lockheed Martin spokesman said the company could hire 2,000 substitutes if the dispute continued through the summer.
abstract: Lockheed Martin announces that it has hired 300 temporary workers to replace striking union employees at its fighter plane plant in Fort Worth, saying it could continue to hire more.
lead_paragraph: A Lockheed Martin spokesman said the company could hire 2,000 substitutes if the dispute continued through the summer.

headline.seo: Lockheed Is Replacing Strikers at F-35 Plant in Texas
headline.main: Lockheed Is Replacing Strikers at Fighter Plane Plant
headline.print_headline: Lockheed Is Replacing Strikers at Fighter Plane Plant
